transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, haanji.
Customer: Hi, good afternoon.
Executive: Hello ma'am, haanji bataiyega.
Customer: Haan ma'am, morning mein aapne call kiya tha 75 wale number se?
Executive: Sir ne kara hoga ma'am.
Customer: Okay, okay, theek hai, no issue. Aapne abhi system open kiya hua hai apna?
Executive: Haanji ma'am.
Customer: Okay. So jaise ki main past leads mein check kar rahi hu to boom barrier ki hume buyleads aa rahi hai. To boom barrier ki hume buyleads chahiye, right?
Executive: Bilkul chahiye ma'am.
Customer: To ek baar apna buyleads wala section open kariye, usme boom barrier search kariye.
Executive: Buyleads, ek second ma'am.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ye Azamgarh, Uttar Pradesh se ek universal remote receiver.
Executive: Haanji, haanji, universal remote receiver.
Customer: To isko hum le sakte hai?
Executive: Haan bilkul ma'am, isko message kar dijiye.
Customer: Haan, to kar dijiye confirm isko. And dusri ek aur hai parking boom barrier road dekhiye, ye Connaught Place.
Executive: Haan, Connaught Place.
Customer: Ye retail lead hai to you can might be you can like lena hai ki nahi lena hai.
Executive: Haanji, haanji, haanji.
Customer: Theek hai and uske alawa actually maine matlab thoda ispe analyze kiya hai.
Customer: To aisa koi reason nikal ke to aa nahi raha hai. Maine matlab products ke na, wo changes kiye hai. Category boom barrier ke product aur automatic. Mujhe ek baat bataiye, bullet camera mein hum deal kar rahe hai ki nahi kar rahe hai aap?
Executive: Ma'am, bullet camera mein deal karte hai but only in Honeywell. In fact, Honeywell.
Customer: Honeywell mein karte hai basically. Ek baar products pe jaaiye.
Executive: Kispe jaau, products pe? Okay.
Customer: Haan, products pe bullet camera search kariye.
Customer: Ek product hi available hai abhi. Honeywell bullet camera jiska price hai 2450 per piece. Category humne choose ki hai Honeywell bullet camera.
Executive: Haanji.
Customer: To is product mein hum deal kar rahe hai?
Executive: Ek minute ma'am, bullet camera. Hmm. Kaunsa bata rahe hai aap?
Customer: Bullet camera search kar lijiye. Ek hi product hai bullet camera ka.
Executive: Haan, ek hi show kar raha hai.
Customer: Hmm. Aur to mujhe ye bataiye iska hum deal karte hai isme?
Customer: Yes or no?
Executive: Haanji ma'am, bullet camera mein hum log deal karte hai.
Customer: To buyleads aati hai to aap unko consume kar rahe hai bullet camera ki?
Executive: Haanji.
Customer: Okay. Actually jo stock mein available rehta hai sirf usi ko hi hum log consume karte hai.
Customer: To wahi main kehna chah rahi hu kaunsa available hai abhi stock mein?
Executive: Ma'am, just a second, ye to mujhe sir se pata karna padega. Ek minute rukiye main aapko batati hu.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ek second.
Executive: Ma'am, ye mujhe search se actually abhi confirm karna padega.
Customer: Okay, theek hai, no issues. To aap ye bullet camera ka unse matlab confirm kariye isme hum deal kar rahe hai ki nahi kar rahe hai. And other side.
Executive: Bullet camera mein to hum log deal kar hi rahe hai.
Customer: Haan, haan, basically kuch isme, kuch usme models rehte hai jo abhi available nahi hai to usko main consume nahi karti hu, baki hum log consume kar lete hai.
Executive: Hmm, hmm, okay, okay, no issue. To on other side jaise ki maine aapko bola, ye sabse pehle aapko ye confirm karna hai ki bullet camera hum kar rahe hai, kaunsa kar rahe hai aur kaunsa hum available hai, aage bhi karne wale hai. Other side aapke abhi online 29 products active hai aur inactive 64 products hai. So active se zyada.
Customer: Active se zyada 64 inactive hai, okay. Hmm hmm.
Customer: To unme se mujhe ye dekh ke bataiye aap kaunse products hai jisme aap ab deal karne hi wale nahi hai because ye jo products hai na wo bahut zyada quantity mein jo out of stock aapne mark kiye hue hai aur wo hamare catalog ko hamper kar rahe hai. To first aap ispe se.
Executive: Out of stock to isliye inactive kar rakhe hai hum logo ne. Kyuki queries inhi ki, nahi queries inhi ki hi show ho rahi thi hamare ko.
Customer: Iske alawa aur koi query show nahi ho rahi thi. And cameras ka bhi isi wajah se wo kar rakha hai thoda bahut sa inactive rehna hua hai. Kyuki taki hamare ko aur products ki bhi to query at least show ho na. Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Jo hum matlab, haanji.
Customer: Haan, haan, nahi aapki apne page par aap theek keh rahe hai ki aapne is wajah se dala hoga but actually na ye hamper isliye kar rahe hai kyuki matlab maine check kiya to bahut zyada matlab red area hamara product hota hai matlab wo thoda ek defaulter mein aa jata hai ki active zyada inactive products hai.
Customer: To wo bhi thoda matlab hamper ho raha hai isko that's why main bol rahi hu ki inme se aise products.
Executive: Ye kya customers jo matlab buyleads jo aati hai unke unke customers ko matlab ye cheez kya show hoti hai?
Customer: Yes ma'am, mujhe show hoti hai.
Executive: Achha unko bhi show hoti hai?
Customer: Mere system mein, yes ma'am. Ki aapke na har category rank bhi show hoti hai wo aap bhi check kar sakte hai. Jaise ki maine aapko bataya tha lead manager mein jaake aap lead manager se just upar aapko jo category wo hota hai performance report.
Customer: Aur performance report mein jaake main aapko ek cheez dikhati hu. Ek minute kyuki hamare paas mein jaise ki aapki jo categories hai uski kitni relevant leads hamare paas post ho rahi hai category either wo retail ho aur bulk ho. But abhi jo sabse zyada lead post ho rahi hai IndiaMART pe wo IndiaMART flat panel ki ho rahi hai jo ki abhi November mein 646 ho chuki hai abhi tak and then bottle labeling machine ki ho rahi hai uske baad second number pe third number pe boom barrier ki ho rahi hai. Fourth number pe network video recorder aur network video recorder ki aapke paas zyada isliye aa rahi hai ki uski aapne us pehle kuch time pehle leads consume kari thi. Ab humne dusre products ki consume karni start kari hai to wo thodi thodi aa rahi hai but sari ek sath nahi aa rahi hai jaise ki aapko issues matlab face karne pad rahe hai ki ek product ki sari nahi aa rahi hai is type se. Hmm hmm hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Jaise ki maine aapko bataya tha ki selective products ki hi aa rahi hai main aapko ye bata rahi hu. Dekhiye interactive flat panel ki boom barrier ki round bottle labeling machine ki flap barriers ki inki to leads show hi nahi hoti hai.
Customer: Mera concern hi starting se hi yahi raha hai ki past leads mein show dekhiye abhi past leads mein show ho rahi hai automatic boom barrier 15 minutes ago. But mere paas buyleads mein ye show hi nahi hui hai.
Customer: Mera concern ye hai ki jab tak meri screen pe koi cheez flash nahi hogi main usko consume kaise karungi?
Customer: Hmm, matlab. Mera concern ye hai. Wahi cheez agar screen pe aapke aayi hi nahi hai to aapne to bol diya ki bhai ye sold out ho gayi. But sold out to agar maine koi efforts bhi nahi dale usko consume karne mein tab to mujhe samajh mein bhi aata hai ki chaliye theek hai sold out ho gayi. But koi cheez meri buyleads mein agar mujhe show hi nahi hui hai. Hmm. To fir wo to fir ajeeb lagta hai na ma'am ki yaha pe show nahi hui aur past leads mein show ho rahi hai. Hmm hmm hmm hmm hmm. Mera concern sirf itna hai ki agar mujhe past leads mein koi cheez show ho rahi hai to at least meri buyleads mein flash to kare mujhe. Hmm. Hai na? Ye hai mera concern. One hour ago round bottle labeling machine with coding ki iski aa rakhi hai but mujhe ye maine isko I am interested kar rakha hai past leads mein ja kar ke but mujhe meri buyleads mein ye show hi nahi hui hai buyleads mein to mujhe kal ki PVC silicon label machine aapne dekha hoga. Hmm. Yahi flash ho raha hai bahut der se ma'am main morning se khol ke baithi hu isko matlab aap laga lo 11 baje se to maine isko khola hua hi hai. Aur 11 baje se mujhe aap dekhiye 2 baj chuke hai, 2 bajne ko aaye hai aur yahi aa raha hai yesterday se PVC silicon label machine top pe. Hmm. Aapne kabhi boom barrier wali consume kari hai? Ek aapne labeling machine ki kari hai. Boom barrier ki ma'am main aapko batati hu wo mere ko query aa rakhi thi. Hmm. Jo maine wo consume kari hai wo mujhe lead manager se message aa rakha tha. Wo maine consume kara hai mujhe buyleads se kuch nahi as such show ho raha. Nahi jo maine abhi aapse consume karaya tha wo to buyleads.
Executive: Haan haan haan, wo to wo to buyleads hai wo ek jo aayi hai wo buyleads hai. Haan haan haan. To abhi aap matlab aapke paas kitna wo rehta hai matlab actively ki kitna aapko daily basis pe consume karna hota hai?
Executive: Ma'am as such to kuch nahi hai but haan ye hai ki thoda sa matlab leads to show ho na jiski wajah se hum consume kare to wo hamara day ko bhi pura justice de sake ki haan. Wo working days kya hai ma'am aapke waise? Ma'am five days abhi ke Monday to Friday. Okay. So dekhiye agar main uska by segregation nikal lu.
Customer: To hamari 34 leads jo hai hamare matlab TrustSeal mein 34 weekly milti hai, theek hai? Hmm hmm. To weekly se ab agar aap do din nahi aa rahe hai to us din ki do do char wo to expire ho jayengi agar aap use nahi karenge to sorry karenge. To main 30 maan leti hu wo four mein count nahi kar rahi 30 maan leti hu five days aap working hai. To usko main seven days mein usko divide kar rahi hu. To 4.28 matlab five approx ki five hume daily buyleads use karni hai, theek hai jo hum consume karte hai. Hmm hmm. To aaj ki hamare paas jo wo hai four to consume ho chuki hai ab ek aur consume karni hai, right? To it's not ki wo aapko subah hi mil jayengi ab aap to matlab ki morning se sham tak rehte hai aap to. To maybe sham tak aapko mil jaaye to it's not that ki ek din mein hi sari buyleads aayengi dheere dheere jaise ki main consumption aapka aap maine nikala hua hai wahi main check kar rahi hu. To ek sath buyleads fir bhi hum consume nahi kar sakte hai. Jaise ki abhi aapne I think aaj kal nahi kal Saturday Sunday tha do din hamara use nahi hua tha. But 21 mein then jaise ki aapne do buyleads use kari sir. 20 mein three buyleads use kari 19 mein 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 nine buyleads use kar li 18 mein bhi 7 8 buyleads use kar li. To is type se hai ab aapko wo apna consumption bhi to rakhna hai na jo hamari services hai. Uske according hume jo hamari services chal rahi hai ma'am hume sirf four to five leads hi consume karni hai daily basis pe. Uske alawa hamara focus calls aur inquiries pe jana hai. To isse zyada thoda wo mat karaiye ye thoda matlab strength ho raha hai aisa lag raha hai hume ki aap mujhse keh rahe hai main bhi but jab maine usko socha kyuki hamari jo services hai wo TrustSeal ki hai jo 34 buyleads hume weekly mil rahi hai to it's agar zyada leads abhi aa bhi jayengi to hum consume nahi kar payenge to kya fayda hai to isse achha hai jo buyleads aaye achhi aaye aur hum unse daily basis pe use kare and ye bhi nahi hai ki weekly mein jitni 34 koi 34 buyleads hai wo sari hi convert ho jayengi. Hmm. Agar usme se maybe aap daily basis pe consume karne four or five bhi wo convert ho jaaye to beneficial hai, right? Bilkul haanji. Haan, to isi type se humne isko dekhna hai to na hi aap usko thoda negative way mein le hum usko positive way mein karte hai main dheere dheere daily basis pe kuch na kuch usme changes kar hi rahi hu. Aap bhi mujhe message kar rahe hai to definitely main check to kar hi rahi hu usko. Actually main jab aapne matlab sir ne call kiya tha I think main meeting mein thi but maine subah aate hi apne matlab already maine apne senior ko bhi highlight kiya hua hai ye concern. Don't worry ki aapko maybe aapko aisa kehne ki zarurat nahi hai dobara dobara ki matlab sir bhi aise pareshan ho rahe the. I think aapne message kiya tha group pe dono. Hmm hmm hmm. Maybe sir ne kiya hai to I understand ki aap work kar rahe hai morning se matlab evening tak but maine bhi usko concern ko feedback ko raise kiya hai apne manager se bhi kiya hai and I think wo bhi aapko call karne wale hai thode time mein but don't worry main ispe kuch na kuch daily basis pe changes kara rahi hu and abhi mera matlab baat ho rahi thi mere manager se senior se bhi to wo keh rahe the I think it's matlab maine jaise because ho sakta hai ki main nahi dekh pa rahi hu kuch aisa jo mujhse nahi ho pa raha solve to unhone maine catalog dikhaya ki catalog mein kuch aisa issue hai jo hum isko solve nahi kar pa rahe hai aisa kyu ho raha hai. To tester se to maine side check kara li piche se background se matlab technical team se wo keh rahe hai aisa koi issue nahi hai to hum isko catalog koi aur enhancement kar sakte hai. Theek hai apni jo hamari A rank hai jo hamari A rank pehle ki thi wo sari red products mein aa raha hai I think matlab out of stock products aa rahe hai to usme se aap wo products dekhiye jo aap deal nahi karne wale in future jo 64 products inactive hai usme se aap wo product check karaiye ya fir search pe bait ke sath baat kariye ki jo hum deal nahi karne wale in future to unko delete kara dijiye taki wo thoda jo count hai wo kam ho jaaye inactive wala. Theek hai ma'am, theek hai. Theek hai aur agar usme bullet camera wale jo hai aap available hai unhe active kar dijiye. Agar aapko bullet camera ki zyada leads nahi chahiye to setting mein jaake buyleads preference mein jaake jis buylead aapko zyada aa rahi hai but uski nahi chahiye to category mein jaake not preferred category mein usko mention kar dijiye. Jab aap setting mein jayenge then waha pe sabse last fourth option hai buyleads preference fir preferred location wala aata hai aur not preferred location location wise agar aapko wo karna hai ki is state ki nahi chahiye other other side preferred category ka option aata hai preferred category to wo hoti hai jo aapne choose ki hui hai and then the other side not preferred categories ki aapko kaunsi buyleads zyada aa rahi hai is category ki but aapko nahi chahiye to wo waha par aap add kar sakte hai. Not it for one time aap waha se add kar sakte hai remove bhi kar sakte hai to abhi aapko is product ki category nahi chahiye to wo add kar dijiye wo aani band ho jayengi but in future chahiye hongi to waha se dobara wo kar dijiyega. Hmm hmm hmm. Aise hum usko kar sakte hai. Theek hai setting pe jaake na buyleads. Haan haan setting buyleads preference pe jaake fir niche buy category ka option aayega. Okay. Theek hai. And agar koi issue hota hai to main fir bhi call karati hu apne manager se isko matlab already maine highlight kiya hua hai, okay? Don't worry ma'am, okay. Okay, thank you, have a good day. Thank you ma'am. You too ma'am, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving buyleads.

- Wants to know why buyleads are not showing.

- Wants to know how to consume buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to check performance report.

- Executive explained how to set buylead preferences.

- Executive confirmed the issue has been highlighted.



Next Steps: 

- Manager will call the customer soon.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, catalog, products
